title: PRICE REDUCED 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Jimmy Collins HOF RC (BGS 1)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Jimmy Collins HOF RC (BGS 1)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely rare 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement - Jimmy Collins HOF Rookie which has been graded a BGS 1 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, an industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scans of the front and back of the card for condition details as the piece presents much, much better than the technical grade due to a few surface wrinkles. Sale price on this beauty is $795.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
